amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to fully fund Section 7081 of the SUPPORT Act, preventing overdoses while in emergency rooms. The program would create a coordinated care model for overdose patients who present in the emergency room.
amendment.purpose: Amendment provides $10 million in funding for a new program at the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to develop best practices for emergency treatment and the coordination and continuation of care for overdose patients.
